channel.title: Skillcapes at 99-Please read
channel.description: Hello Moparscape,I was wondering How I would make it so when you get 99 of a skill you Add that skillcape and hood to your inventory. Please reply All help appreciated ~Thanks.

item.title: Skillcapes at 99-Please read
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

find case 0:

and add this

       case 0: // Attack levelup
       refreshSkills();
	   sendFrame164(6247);
	   stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
	   sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248);
	   sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249);
	   sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level.");
	   NpcDialogueSend = true;
	   if (playerLevel[0] >= 99) {
addItem(10706,1);
addItem(10705,1);
txt4 = "w000t 99 attack ftw!";
string4UpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[0] +" attack!");
}
	   break;

string4UpdateRequired = true;

just makes it so when they get a 99 stat it says above ther head =p

item.title: Skillcapes at 99-Please read
item.dc:creator: @GoldenScape GoldenScape
item.description:
@GoldenScape wrote:

Hello Moparscape,I was wondering How I would make it so when you get 99 of a skill you Add that skillcape and hood to your inventory.
Please reply
All help appreciated
~Thanks.

Read full topic
